sense.def:
One's friends
so osebe, ki jih dobro poznamo in radi preživljamo čas z njimi.

seg.quote: He was my best friend at Oxford.

sense.def:
To be friends with someone
pomeni nekoga imeti rad in z veseljem preživljati čas z njim.

seg.quote: You used to be friends with him, didn't you?

sense.def:
To make friends with someone
pomeni z nekom začeti prijateljstvo.

Osebe, ki pomagajo in podpirajo neko stvar ali državo, pogosto imenujemo
its friends
.

seg.quote: All friends of Ireland should support us.
